text: mariyu allāh mariyu āyana sandēśaharuḍu, oka viṣayanlō nirṇayaṁ tīsukunnappuḍu, viśvasin̄cina puruṣuniki gānī lēka viśvasin̄cina strīki gānī ā viṣayanlō maroka nirṇayaṁ tīsukunē hakku lēdu. Mariyu evaḍaitē allāh mariyu āyana sandēśaharuniki avidhēyuḍavutāḍō, vāstavaṅgā, ataḍu spaṣṭamaina mārgabhraṣṭatvanlō paḍi unnaṭlē
